title: 'Atlanta’ Season 4, Episode 3 Recap
description:
Charles and Van take a close look at the third episode of ‘Atlanta’ Season 4, while diving into what it means to be an aging rapper in the music industry.
Hosts: Charles Holmes and Van Lathan
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
